publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1194# Scott Barrie: Recognition of Jack Vettriano-That the Parliament notes the increasing popularity, both at home and abroad, of the Fife-born and bred artist Jack Vettriano; notes the sale by auction of his most recognised work, "The Singing Butler", for a record amount for a painting sold in Scotland by a Scottish artist; notes with dismay that not one of his works appears in any of our national galleries, and believes that at least one of his paintings should be obtained by one of our national institutions to recognise his contemporary popularity and national significance. Supported by: Christine May*, Janis Hughes*, Rhona Brankin*

S2M-1194# Scott Barrie: Recognition of Jack Vettriano-That the Parliament notes the increasing popularity, both at home and abroad, of the Fife-born and bred artist Jack Vettriano; notes the sale by auction of his most recognised work, "The Singing Butler", for a record amount for a painting sold in Scotland by a Scottish artist; notes with dismay that not one of his works appears in any of our national galleries, and believes that at least one of his paintings should be obtained by one of our national institutions to recognise his contemporary popularity and national significance. Supported by: Christine May, Janis Hughes, Rhona Brankin
S2M-1194# Recognition of Jack Vettriano (lodged on 22 April 2004) Dr Elaine Murray*, Linda Fabiani*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1194# Recognition of Jack Vettriano (lodged on 22 April 2004) Fergus Ewing*
S2M-1194# Recognition of Jack Vettriano (lodged on 22 April 2004) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-1194# Recognition of Jack Vettriano (lodged on 22 April 2004) Jackie Baillie*
S2M-1194# Recognition of Jack Vettriano (lodged on 22 April 2004) Mary Scanlon*
S2M-1194# Recognition of Jack Vettriano (lodged on 22 April 2004) Pauline McNeill*, Elaine Smith*
S2M-1194# Recognition of Jack Vettriano (lodged on 22 April 2004) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-1194# Recognition of Jack Vettriano (lodged on 22 April 2004) Tricia Marwick*, Irene Oldfather*
S2M-1194# Recognition of Jack Vettriano (lodged on 22 April 2004) Helen Eadie*
S2M-1194# Recognition of Jack Vettriano (lodged on 22 April 2004) Trish Godman*
